# Past Perfect Progressive

**Rule**  Highlights the *ongoing* nature of a past action up to a second past moment.

**Example (news clip – video)**

{{< video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z0Kq2uLDpLw" title="BBC reporter: The workers had been striking for weeks…" width=640 height=360 >}}

> *“The workers **had been striking** for weeks when the agreement was signed.”*
